description:
A soldier in the Earth Military`s forces who is stationed on Solo, Bes becomes the leader of the refugees on the Solo Ship following the Buff Clan attack. He initially is the pilot of the Sol Vainer/Ideo-Nova, but retires from piloting it and takes on the role of Solo Ship captain. Bes is a well liked and respected member of the Solo Ship crew and begins a romantic relationship with Karala.

Karala eventually becomes pregnant with Bes`s child, whom the Solo Ship crew nickname "Messiah". He continues to lead the Solo Ship into its final battle against the Buff Clan. During the battle he is shot multiple times by Buff Clan soldiers and is killed upon the destruction of the Solo Ship.
name: Jordan Bes
